# EvolutionBorg - Phase 1 (Early Game)
# Generated by: Opus 4.5
# Levels 1-20, Dungeon Depth 1-30
# Focus: Survival and resource accumulation

# Worships
borg_worships_damage = FALSE
borg_worships_speed = FALSE
borg_worships_hp = TRUE
borg_worships_mana = FALSE
borg_worships_ac = TRUE
borg_worships_gold = TRUE

# Behavior
borg_plays_risky = FALSE
borg_kills_uniques = FALSE
borg_uses_swaps = FALSE
borg_no_deeper = 30
borg_cheat_death = FALSE

# Transition to Phase 2 when:
# - Character level >= 20 (primary)
# - Dungeon depth > 25 (secondary)
# - Gold > 100,000 (fallback)
